title: 162: Chopper in Danger! Former God vs. Priest Shura!
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: A detailed written review and analysis of Episode 162, praising the balance between exposition and action. The reviewer highlights Gan Fall's philosophical discussions about pirates and morality, Chopper's terrifying ordeal with Shura, and the introduction of the Ordeal of String. Special praise given to voice actress Ikue ÅŒtani for conveying Chopper's genuine fear.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains analysis and spoilers for Episode 162 only

title: One Piece: Skypiea Arc | Summary, Recap & Review
author: Poggers Editorial Team
description: Comprehensive analysis of the entire Skypiea arc, describing it as 'a mixed bag of adventure and storytelling' that 'offers moments of wonder and excitement' but 'suffers from pacing issues'. Rates the arc 7 out of 10.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for entire Skypiea arc

title: One Piece: Skypiea Is the Arc You Either Love or Hate
author: CBR Editorial
description: Analysis of the polarizing nature of the Skypiea arc. Notes that the arc is very divisive - some consider it One Piece's magnum opus while others view it as one of the worst arcs. Mentions that Crunchyroll controversially ranked Skypiea as number one in their arc rankings.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains discussion of entire Skypiea arc

title: One Piece: Why Skypiea Is The Most Crucial Arc In The Story So Far
author: GameRant Editorial
description: Article arguing that with incredible storytelling, mind-blowing lore, and what seems to be a preview of One Piece's endgame, Skypiea might very well be the most important arc in the story. Discusses the arc's world-building and foreshadowing elements.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains analysis of Skypiea arc with potential endgame implications

title: How Skypiea Became One Piece's Most Underappreciated Arc
author: CBR Editorial
description: Article exploring why the Skypiea arc is underappreciated by some fans despite its strong themes, world-building, and character development. Argues that the arc deserves more recognition for its contributions to the overall story.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains discussion of entire Skypiea arc

title: GAN FALL VS PRIEST SHURA! | ONE PIECE Episode 162 Couples Reaction & Discussion
author: Couples Reaction Channel
description: A couples reaction video to One Piece Episode 162, featuring live reactions to Gan Fall's battle with Shura and discussion of the episode's key moments.

title: ONE PIECE EPISODE 162 REACTION!!!
author: According to Lucky
description: Patreon-exclusive reaction video to One Piece Episode 162, featuring commentary and analysis of Chopper's confrontation with Shura.
